bill.summary: 2/27/2001--Introduced. Amends the Elementary and Secondary Education Act of 1965 to revise and reauthorize provisions for school infrastructure improvement grants for repair, renovation, alteration, and construction of public elementary and secondary school facilities.Directs the Secretary of Education to allocate such funds as follows: (1) one-third among States; (2) one-third among largest school districts; and (3) one-third among high-growth school districts.Makes any public charter school that constitutes a local educational agency (LEA) under State law eligible for such assistance under the same terms and conditions as any other LEA.Provides for prompt payment of contractors performing federally-assisted work under this Act.
